endpoints.name: Get account information
endpoints.description: Gets information about the account you are currently accessing, including CNAME, AccountID and account type.

endpoints.name: Get defined email senders
endpoints.description: Get a list of all defined email senders for the account.

endpoints.name: Get upload custom event status
endpoints.description: Get details of a contact

pathParameters.name: Customevent ID
pathParameters.description: ID returned by upload request.

endpoints.name: Get listing of lists
endpoints.description: Get a list of all defined email senders for the account.

endpoints.name: Download a list
endpoints.description: Download the specified list from your account.

pathParameters.name: List Id
pathParameters.description: The id of list to be updated {listid} in path above.

queryParameters.name: Modified Before
queryParameters.description: Filter on date 'modified before timestamp.',Unix timestamp, in milliseconds

queryParameters.name: Modified After
queryParameters.description: Filter on date 'modified after timestamp.',Unix timestamp, in milliseconds

queryParameters.name: Created Before
queryParameters.description: Filter on date 'created before timestamp.',Unix timestamp, in milliseconds

queryParameters.name: Created After
queryParameters.description: Filter on date 'created after timestamp.'Unix timestamp, in milliseconds

queryParameters.name: Fields
queryParameters.description: A semicolon ( ; ) delimited list of fields to display in the returned list. Fields provided should be urlencoded. The '_contact_id_' field is always returned.This parameter is optional. If it is not provided, the whole list will be returned.

queryParameters.name: Date Qualifiers
queryParameters.description: If specified as 'true', the returned list will include timestamps* for each row denoting the dates created and modified. These columns will be headed with the names '__created_date' and '__modified_date'.

endpoints.name: Get list upload status
endpoints.description: Check on the status of a list upload.

pathParameters.name: Job Id
pathParameters.description: The jobid of the list upload.

endpoints.name: Get rejected records from an upload
endpoints.description: Download CSV file containing rejected upload records.

queryParameters.name: File Name
queryParameters.description: The api call 'Get upload custom event status' can return a JSON parameter for 'rejectedRecordsUrl'. The corresponding value is a file name (i.e. something like api_upload_5_7_192.168.182.133_85017.dat_bad.csv). Enter that file name for this parameter.

endpoints.name: Get hard bounce list
endpoints.description: Get a list of hard bounces associated with the account.

queryParameters.name: Count
queryParameters.description: Quantity of records to return in response, if no value given, it defaults to the maximum value of 1000.

queryParameters.name: Created Before
queryParameters.description: Epoch seconds date. Only records created before the supplied value will be returned.

queryParameters.name: Created After
queryParameters.description: Epoch seconds date. Only records created after the supplied value will be returned.

endpoints.name: Get spam complaint list
endpoints.description: Get a list of spam complaints from your account.

queryParameters.name: Count
queryParameters.description: Quantity of records to return in response, if no value given, it defaults to the maximum value of 1000.

queryParameters.name: Created Before
queryParameters.description: Epoch seconds date. Only records created before the supplied value will be returned.

queryParameters.name: Created After
queryParameters.description: Epoch seconds date. Only records created after the supplied value will be returned.

endpoints.name: Get optout list
endpoints.description: Get a list of optouts associated with the account.

queryParameters.name: Count
queryParameters.description: Quantity of records to return in response, if no value given, it defaults to the maximum value of 1000.

queryParameters.name: Created Before
queryParameters.description: Epoch seconds date. Only records created before the supplied value will be returned.

queryParameters.name: Created After
queryParameters.description: Epoch seconds date. Only records created after the supplied value will be returned.

endpoints.name: Get subscription opt-outs by category
endpoints.description: Download list of records specifically opted out of a specific category

queryParameters.name: Category
queryParameters.description: The subscription category (by name) you would like to obtain an itemized list of opted-out records.

queryParameters.name: Count
queryParameters.description: Quantity of records to return in response, if no value given, it defaults to the maximum value of 1000.

endpoints.name: Get logo list
endpoints.description: Get a list of the logos in the account.

endpoints.name: Get a logo
endpoints.description: Check on the status of a list upload.

pathParameters.name: Logo Id
pathParameters.description: The id of the logo.

endpoints.name: Get header list
endpoints.description: Get a list of headers in the account.

endpoints.name: Get a header
endpoints.description: Get the specified header from your account.

pathParameters.name: Header Id
pathParameters.description: The id of the header you want to get.

endpoints.name: Get footer list
endpoints.description: Get a list of footer in the account.

endpoints.name: Get a footer
endpoints.description: Get the specified footer from your account.

pathParameters.name: Footer Id
pathParameters.description: The id of the footer you want to get.

endpoints.name: Get image list
endpoints.description: Get a list of the images in your account.

queryParameters.name: foldernames
queryParameters.description: Semicolon delimited list of folder names to get the images from. If not included then all images in all folder names are retrieved.

endpoints.name: Get an image
endpoints.description: Get the image, specified by Act-On id, from the account. To obtain a list of all images in the account the associated ids, use Get image list.

pathParameters.name: Image Id
pathParameters.description: The id of the image you want to get.

endpoints.name: Get media list
endpoints.description: Get a listing of media objects stored in your account.

endpoints.name: Get media file
endpoints.description: Gets a path to the specified media file that was previously added to your account.

pathParameters.name: Media Id
pathParameters.description: The id of the media file you want to retrieve.

endpoints.name: Get form list
endpoints.description: Get a list of the forms in your Forms repository.

endpoints.name: Get promotional form URLs
endpoints.description: Get the promotional URLs associated with the specified form, by form ID. To get a listing of forms in an account with their associated IDs, use the Get Forms List API.

pathParameters.name: Form Id
pathParameters.description: The id of the form for which you are requesting URLs.

endpoints.name: Get page
endpoints.description: Get data for the specified page.

pathParameters.name: Page Id
pathParameters.description: The id of the page to retrieve.

endpoints.name: Get promotional page URLs
endpoints.description: Get the URLs for the specified promotional page.

pathParameters.name: Page Id
pathParameters.description: The id of the page you're requesting a URL for.

endpoints.name: Get list of programs
endpoints.description: Get a list of all programs of a specified type.

queryParameters.name: Type
queryParameters.description: Program type to return. Valid values are TRACK, EVENT and LIST_MAINT.

endpoints.name: Get message report
endpoints.description: Get a report on the specified message.

pathParameters.name: Message Id
pathParameters.description: The id of the message on which you want a report.

endpoints.name: Get message report drilldown
endpoints.description: Get a drilldown report for a specific email message.

pathParameters.name: Message Id
pathParameters.description: The id of the message to get a report about

pathParameters.name: Drilldown
pathParameters.description: Drilldown

queryParameters.name: Count
queryParameters.description: Number of records to download.

queryParameters.name: Response Format
queryParameters.description: Desired response format. Valid values are JSON and CSV with JSON being the default value. If CSV is specified then the first row will be the headers and following rows will be double quoted comma separated values. While JSON is limited to 1,000 per API call, CSV can return all even if it is large.

endpoints.name: Get message report by time period
endpoints.description: Fetch the message rollup report from your account

queryParameters.name: Period
queryParameters.description: The time period for which you are requesting a report.String (Format: yyMM, so January, 2014 == '1401')

endpoints.name: Get media report
endpoints.description: Get a report on the specified media from your account.

pathParameters.name: Media Id
pathParameters.description: The id of the media object on which you want a report.

endpoints.name: Get media message report
endpoints.description: Get a media message report from your account.

pathParameters.name: Media Id
pathParameters.description: The id of the media object on which you want a report.

endpoints.name: Get a media view report
endpoints.description: Get a media view report from your account.

pathParameters.name: Media Id
pathParameters.description: The id of the media object you want a views report on.

endpoints.name: Get a media timeline report
endpoints.description: Get a timeline report for specified media.

pathParameters.name: Media Id
pathParameters.description: The id of the media object you want a timeline report for.

endpoints.name: Get form report
endpoints.description: Gets a path to the specified media file that was previously added to your account.

pathParameters.name: Form Id
pathParameters.description: The id of the media file you want to retrieve.

endpoints.name: Get page report
endpoints.description: Get a list of the pages listed in the account.

pathParameters.name: Page Id
pathParameters.description: The Act-On id of the page for which you want a report.

endpoints.name: Get spam complaint list
endpoints.description: Get the current spam complaint information.

endpoints.name: Get hard bounce list
endpoints.description: Download a list of hard bounces.

endpoints.name: Get message list
endpoints.description: Use to retrieve a listing of emails by type.

endpoints.name: Get message report
endpoints.description: Get a report on the specified message.

pathParameters.name: Message Id
pathParameters.description: The id of the message to get a report about

pathParameters.name: Drilldown
pathParameters.description: Drilldown

queryParameters.name: Count
queryParameters.description: Number of records to download.

queryParameters.name: Response Format
queryParameters.description: Desired response format. Valid values are JSON and CSV with JSON being the default value. If CSV is specified then the first row will be the headers and following rows will be double quoted comma separated values. While JSON is limited to 1,000 per API call, CSV can return all even if it is large.

endpoints.name: Get message report drilldown
endpoints.description: Get a drilldown report for a specific email message.

pathParameters.name: Message Id
pathParameters.description: The id of the message to get a report about

pathParameters.name: Drilldown
pathParameters.description: Drilldown

queryParameters.name: Count
queryParameters.description: Number of records to download.

queryParameters.name: Response Format
queryParameters.description: Desired response format. Valid values are JSON and CSV with JSON being the default value. If CSV is specified then the first row will be the headers and following rows will be double quoted comma separated values. While JSON is limited to 1,000 per API call, CSV can return all even if it is large.

endpoints.name: Get message report by time period
endpoints.description: Fetch the message rollup report from your account

queryParameters.name: Period
queryParameters.description: The time period for which you are requesting a report.String (Format: yyMM, so January, 2014 == '1401')

endpoints.name: Get message HTML contents
endpoints.description: Get the HTML content of a Sent, Draft or Message Template

pathParameters.name: MsgID
pathParameters.description: The msg ID of the Sent, Draft or Message Template

pathParameters.name: RecID
pathParameters.description: An optional argument to flatten personalization variables in the message for a specific recipient ID

endpoints.name: Get contact from list based on cookie ID or e-mail
endpoints.description: Gets a contact record from a list based on a cookie ID and/or email address.

pathParameters.name: List Id
pathParameters.description: The listid of the list.

queryParameters.name: Email
queryParameters.description: If provided, the contact is searched for by cookieid first. If not found then email is used, if provided. Request must include either cookieid or email and can contain both.

endpoints.name: Get contact fact and score data
endpoints.description: Get a contact record's activity facts and scores.

pathParameters.name: List Id
pathParameters.description: The listid of the list.

pathParameters.name: Record Id
pathParameters.description: The recordid of the contact.

endpoints.name: Get subscription categories
endpoints.description: Get a list of subscriptions listed by category.

endpoints.name: Get subscription category opt-ins by email
endpoints.description: Get a list of categories that an email address has explicitly opted into.

queryParameters.name: Email
queryParameters.description: Email address of the record to retrieve explicit opt-ins

endpoints.name: Get SEO keywords
endpoints.description: Fetch the set of SEO keywords from the account.

queryParameters.name: URL
queryParameters.description: The URL-encoded URL string on which to generate a report.

operations.name: Delete account users
operations.description: Delete one or more users from an account.

operations.name: Delete account user
operations.description: Delete one user from an account.

parameters.description: Email address for the user to delete from the account.

operations.name: Delete records from a list
operations.description: Delete multiple records from the specified list.

parameters.description: The id {listid} of list to be deleted

operations.name: Delete a logo
operations.description: Delete the specified logo from your account.

parameters.description: The ID of the logo you want to delete.

operations.name: Add a header
operations.description: Add a new header to your account.

parameters.description: The id of the header you want to ignore.

operations.name: Update a header
operations.description: Update the specified header.

parameters.description: The id of the header you want to update.

operations.name: Create or Update Header
operations.description: Creates a new header and Update an existing header

parameters.description: The id of the header

operations.name: Delete a header
operations.description: Delete the specified header from your account.

parameters.description: The ID of the header you want to delete.

operations.name: Add a new footer
operations.description: Add a new footer to your account.

parameters.description: The id of the footer you want to ignore.

operations.name: Update a footer
operations.description: Update an existing footer in the account.

parameters.description: ID of the footer you want to update.

operations.name: Create or Update footer
operations.description: Creates a new footer and Update an existing footer

parameters.description: The id of the footer

operations.name: Delete a footer
operations.description: Delete an existing footer from the account.

parameters.description: The ID of the footer you want to delete.

operations.name: Delete an image
operations.description: Delete an image (by id) from your account.

parameters.description: The id of the image you want to delete.

operations.name: Add a media link
operations.description: Add a new URL as a trackable link in your media library.

operations.name: Delete a media object
operations.description: Delete a media file from your account.

parameters.description: The id of the media object you want to delete.

operations.name: Delete page.
operations.description: Delete a page.

parameters.description: Id of the page to delete.

operations.name: Resend a message
operations.description: Update/resend the specified message.

parameters.description: ID of the email message you want to resend.

operations.name: Add new template or draft message
operations.description: Add a draft message or template message to your account.

parameters.description: ID of the draft message

operations.name: Update template or draft message
operations.description: Update an existing draft message or template in your account.

parameters.description: The id of the draft message or template to be modified.

operations.name: Create or Update template or draft message
operations.description: Creates a new template or draft message and Update an existing template or draft message

parameters.description: The id of the draft message or template to be modified.

operations.name: Delete a message
operations.description: Delete a specified message or template.

parameters.description: The id of the draft message or template to be modified.

operations.name: Add a contact
operations.description: Add a contact record to the specified list.

parameters.name: List Id
parameters.description: listid of the list.
The recordid

operations.name: Add or Update Contact
operations.description: Add a contact and update existing record to the specified list.

parameters.name: List Id
parameters.description: List Id of the list.
The Record Id

operations.name: Update a contact by record ID
operations.description: Update the specified contact record in the specified list.

parameters.name: List Id
parameters.description: List Id of the list.
The Record Id, expressed as listid:recordid of the contact to update.

operations.name: Upsert a contact record by email
operations.description: Update an existing record or insert a new contact record using the email address

parameters.name: List Id
parameters.description: listid of the list.

parameters.name: Email
parameters.description: The email address of the contact to update.

operations.name: Delete a contact
operations.description: Remove the specified contact record from the specified list.

parameters.description: listid of the list.
The recordid, expressed as listid:recordid of the contact to update.

operations.name: Opt in/Opt out subscription category by email address
operations.description: Add/remove individual records from a subscription category by email address.

operations.name: Opt in/Opt out multiple subscription categories by email address
operations.description: Add/remove individual records from multiple subscription category by email address.
